page.title: 20ASTON CHURCHES
page.content:
CHURCH OF ST. MICHAEL This is the Roman Catholic Church. It is known locally as the church of the seven parishes. These are namely Walton, Hilderstone, MIlwich, Burston, Sandon, Little Stoke and Aston. It was built by Father Dominic c.1845 who came from Italy with the intent of being a Papal Missionary. He was later to die in Aston.
CHURCH OF ST. SAVIOUR This is the Church of England church in the Parish of St. Michael. In fact the rector of the Stone St. Michael's Parish Church is also rector of St. Saviours. It was extensively rebuilt in the early 1800's. Next to it was founded an Elementary school called Aston School. This was closed in the late 1960's when only 7 children were left on roll.
